title: Canadian Tire Font
content:
[Canadian Tire](http://web.archive.org/web/20141119211859/http:/wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/e8/e8c3bff5b309a32375c8edf581f80c3a.39736.jpeg)

Does anyone know this font, or if it's a custom job?
author: Nunymare

comments.content: With some simple modifications you could get it with [FF Golden Gate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/)

The sign on the Canadian Tire across from my house uses Futura Display. The sample you posted seems a little lighter than that though.

Steile Futura / Tasse might also work.

- Lex
